channel.title: A few questions about Sorces and Clients
channel.description:
I was wondering if anyone can can link me to a source that has skill capes and other new items, i was also wondering if you could give me a client i can edit and make work with my source.
I was also wondering....
-Max amount of items for a shop? -Is it possible to make multiple pages for a shop?

item.title: A few questions about Sorces and Clients
item.dc:creator: @Barrage1 Denoria
item.description:
@Barrage1 wrote:

[quote=“H2O, post:5, topic:273916”]Yes, how many.[/quote]Oh, one second. ill edit this post

edit: 40 items per shop.

Read full topic
item.source: A few questions about Sorces and Clients

item.title: A few questions about Sorces and Clients
item.dc:creator: @H2O H2O
item.source: A few questions about Sorces and Clients

item.title: A few questions about Sorces and Clients
item.dc:creator: @Barrage1 Denoria
item.description:
@Barrage1 wrote:

[quote=“H2O, post:3, topic:273916”][quote author=Denoria link=topic=361953.msg2751638#msg2751638 date=1239940541]
Hi there, Try taking a look in the Server Download Section and for the shops it depends on the source, it can be 999m or 2147m, anyways look at the Server Download Section, for a good client, source.

and for the pages, yes but it would have to be coded.
[/quote]

I have tried looking all over and i cannot find what im looking for, as for the shop questions, you did not answer my first one, you only gave me prices.

But thanks.[/quote]Do you mean how much items can fit in a shop?

Read full topic
item.source: A few questions about Sorces and Clients
